function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Loss of income during the covid-19 crisis is associated with poor mental health.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient information and negative data contribute to high levels of anxiety and stress.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-related factors contributing to stress and ptsd","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low-income level contributing to worse mental health","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of education associated with higher depressive symptoms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of anxiety symptoms in the studies range from 8.3% to 81.1%","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the definition of anxiety and cut-off points in different studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of anxiety with sociodemographic factors like gender, age, occupation, income, and education","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of home confinement and social distancing on the mental health of the general population.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of poor mental health due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of anxiety, depression, and ptsd in the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of anxiety, depression, and ptsd with covid-19 knowledge, economic losses, and concern about infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation of anxiety, depression, and ptsd with demographic factors such as gender, age, marital status, and education level.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in mental health outcomes based on age, sex, marital status, and spiritual well-being, with varying levels of risk and protective factors.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to close contact in confined spaces and lack of physical distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of restrictive measures and social isolation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparities in anxiety and depression","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of bias in the selection and evaluation of studies due to the involvement of multiple evaluators","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or inadequate reporting of study characteristics and results","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in the application of inclusion criteria for study selection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of studies with cross-sectional or longitudinal methodology","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of specific sub-groups from the study","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on english, spanish, french, italian, or portuguese studies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through extensive use of public databases and scientific literature","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical and mental health impact of social distancing and home confinement during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of search strategies and terminology in the research protocol","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased feelings of loneliness among younger age groups during the covid-19 pandemic leading to symptoms of anxiety and depression.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to pay attention to and strengthen the public’s mental health to minimize the consequences of loneliness and social isolation due to covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on digital health practices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable integration of digital health practices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid rollout of digital tools and packages in the medtech sector.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid navigation of governance and digital integration for digital care processes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid education of healthcare workforce leading to potential gaps in knowledge and skills","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital health solutions for rapid redeployment education","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased interaction and communication through social media platforms can lead to the rapid spread of misinformation about contagious diseases and their prevention.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The cancellation of educational activities, such as conferences and training courses, reduces opportunities for healthcare professionals to learn about new developments in disease prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to triage and treat large numbers of patients with respiratory illness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to protect the healthcare workforce to ensure they are able to treat the sick","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-border movement of academics and professionals leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial interventions leading to economic instability and inequality","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of timely and accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited dataset for covid-19 impact on mutual funds","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic and evolving situation of covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misrepresentation in financial research","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the novel coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic evolution of the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transition from riskier to relatively safer options in investment strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transition of funds to utilities, wholesale, and retail firms during the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
